Key Match Events: Spencer Torkelson hit a home run in the 2nd inning
Mickey Moniak hit a home run in the 7th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers needed to win by 2 runs or more to cover the spread. They did not cover, so people who took the Angels won
The over/under was 9 and the teams scored 5 runs, so people who bet the under won
Others: The game ended with a final score of 3-6 in favor of the Tigers
Griffin Canning pitched 5.0 innings for the Angels, allowing 5 hits and 3 earned runs
